entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gonzales Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 p.m. PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this afternoon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
